<title level="1" right="Rules">[Cliffs](/Rules.aspx?ID=2785)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 91 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Cliffs and rock walls require creatures to Climb to ascend or descend. Without extensive safety precautions, a critical failure on Climb checks can result in significant falling damage.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
